sentences.sContent: Restored films are being showcased this month at a festival in Paris.
sentences.sCn: 本月的巴黎电影节将展映一些修复版的电影。

trans.tranCn: 陈列橱，[家具] 陈列柜；显示优点的东西
trans.tranOther: an event or situation that is designed to show the good qualities of a person, organization, product etc

trans.tranCn: 使展现；在玻璃橱窗陈列
trans.tranOther: If something is showcased, it is displayed or presented to its best advantage
